game.name: Witch Play House
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Witch Play House is an unconventional fantasy collection-adventure game that seamlessly blends exhilarating monster-slaying action with a deep collection system. The game features a unique "aesthetic of feet" theme, creating a mysterious world brimming with whimsical imagination.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Witch Play House is an unconventional fantasy collection-adventure game that seamlessly blends exhilarating monster-slaying action with a deep collection system. The game features a unique "aesthetic of feet" theme, creating a mysterious world brimming with whimsical imagination.
